# EXIM Procurement Vendors Process

## How it works

The _EXIM Procurement Vendors_ process is a relatively short and straightforward process. It consists of four (4) main operations that guide the flow of the process. These operations include:

1. Add New Vendor
2. Update Vendor Details
3. View Vendor Details
4. Delete Vendor Details

Upon initiating the _EXIM Procurement Vendors_ process, a dropdown field will be displayed where an operation must be selected from the listing of operations seen above, for the process to continue.

## List of Users

This process will be available to the users listed below only:
